website_summaries.verdict: Now on its tenth version, the Brooks Dyad series has remained to wow users with its functionality and comfort. Many consumers were happy that this neutral running shoe has been improved based on the reviews of the previous version. Although some have pointed out design flaws, the Dyad 10 was easily a remarkable release by Brooks that runners found to be a valuable upgrade.
pros: Many users agreed that the Dyad 10 was a comfortable running shoe
With a wider toe box, the Dyad 10 was easily a significant improvement from the previous version, a wearer said
Others have also favored the Dyad 10 over its predecessor regarding the forefoot fit
One user was pleased that the tenth iteration retained the familiar cushioning and support of the earlier Dyad shoes
The shoe helped eliminate heel pain, as experienced by a wearer
Another user has reported fewer sharp pains in the underfoot since wearing the Dyad 10
Customers were pleased that the shoe was available in various width options
cons: A few buyers were less than happy with the limited color option of the shoe
One user was slightly dissatisfied with the narrow tongue of the Dyad 10
The shoelaces were too short, some reviewers said

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Dyad--No more shopping: I'm all set, thank you!
customer_reviews.text: 6ft and 260+lbs male looked and found a kind of sneaker years ago that fit, are very comfortable and with good cushioning while providing enough support. Brooks Beast felt like blocks of concrete, the Dyads are at the sweet spot of what I need. I buy Dyads sight unseen regardless of cosmetics or blink. Oh, disclaimer: gave up jogging years ago and took up rowing--but still simply swear by the Dyads.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Am I buying men’s or women’s shoes?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Brooks Dyad 10 for my wife as she has another pair that is nearly worn out. When the shoes arrived, I noticed that the box indicated they were men’s shoes, not women’s. The shoes are a bit long so I’d like to return them for the women’s size 9, but there is no indication in your description that tells me if the shoes are men’s or women’s (?). How to I get the proper shoe?
customer_reviews.author: Dupp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good arch support, not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were recommended by several sites as good for people who need arch support. These in fact have adequate arch support and are very comfortable. I have worn them every day for at least two months. On e of the two is starting to fray only the cushioned rib that surrounds the foot opening. I predict that they will be shot in two more months. The soles are thick, durable, wide (like Kramer's shoes in the episode where Mel Tomey mistakes him for someone mentally handicapped), and show no signs or wear. Unfortunately, the shoes are black, so I cannot wear them o my beige carpet because they leave streaks,
customer_reviews.author: Craig Steven Jepson

customer_reviews.title: Wider toe box, excellent for wide flat feet
customer_reviews.text: i tried to cheat on brooks dyad with the new balance 1080, they did not do it for me pinpoint knee pain. i have been a dyad fan since the 7 series, the dyad fans were disappointed with the narrow toe box on the 9 series - i just went up a size to compensate. i wear the 4e sizing and love em. i have wide flat feet ((fred flinstone style)) no hip, back, knee pain. Brooks executives if you have wide feet chances are you’re toes don’t magically narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fatfoot

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: When did shoes get so friggin expensive? Well, I can honestly say these babies are wicked comfortable, and absolutely no regret in this purchase! They look great, and they feel even better. I'm tired of comfortable shoes looking like a 5 year old designed the color concept. Electric red, purple, blue, and let's throw some orange or pink in there too because that makes some kind of sense (No it doesn't at all)... Get these, and you can be happy knowing you don't look like you're trying to run signal planes with your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Rhiannon Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Woow! The best!
customer_reviews.text: Not my first time using this shoes. I walk at work literally more than 10 hours a day and my feet are killing me. Dry, aching and wounded due to blisters. Received this shoes and used them the first day ended my day like i didnt work at all. Im just amazed how a pair of shoes can make a difference between an excellent day or the worst day at work. Highly recommend if you want something comfortable for walking.
customer_reviews.author: ramon felix

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace Dyad 9 shoes I’ve been wearing daily for the last year. I was very happy with the cushioning of the old pair and it seems that the new Dyad 10s have even better cushioning. One thing I noticed immediately was the toe box is much roomier in the new shoes versus the old ones. This is a huge improvement. My initial assessment is that these are great shoes that are improved markedly from the previous generation. I do hope Brooks releases some additional colors so I can add 1 or 2 more pairs to rotate between each week.
customer_reviews.author: desavona

customer_reviews.title: Immediately comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you have to try on a lot of shoes to find something comfortable. These shoes were comfortable as soon as I put them on. I was replacing a set of 5-year old Dyad 7's so I had a history with the brand, which had proven reliable. My new Dyad 10's look great and I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Bought My Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sneaker. My husband walks five miles a day and loves this sneaker. This is his second pair and he is thinking about purchasing another pair in case Brooks changes the style. Delivery was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Look less dorkier in real life than the photo
customer_reviews.text: I love brooks and I decided to buy this shoe after buying the addiction for years. My only reservation was that they look really ugly. They are a little ugly, but in real life look much better than the photo. Performance-wise they are great, especially for people with wide flat feet like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since I Can't Get the Dyad 9s Anymore...
customer_reviews.text: This is turning out to be a great transition from the Dyad 9 to the 10. I require shoes that accommodate custom made inserts. The factory foot beds come out easily and my inserts fit perfectly. Shoe looks good with casual wear. I am very pleased with this purchase. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: OverACliff

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not as good as Dyad 8s
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the Dyad 8 was much better. Disappointed in Dyad 10. Still have good feel to them when walking. I am heavier guy 275+- Overall quality of the shoe uppers is much less substantial. I have switched to another Brooks shoe. Like the Brooks brand.
customer_reviews.author: rrp

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The Dyad is the best sneaker on the market for my flat feet. These feel like my wonderful Dyad 7’s. An absolute bargain even if they were over $150. The 10’s look better than the 7’s but are not as cool as my all black new Brooks Ghost or my all black ASICS GT 1000’s. Either way you will not regret this purchase if you want the best of the best for your feet !!!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Perri

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Dyads for years and love them. I need a 4E and the model 8 and 10 were perfect. The model 9 wasn't as wide so I had to send them back, so when the 10's went on sale I ordered a couple of pairs to make sure I was covered in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: They fit a lot better than the 9's
customer_reviews.text: There ok but I am not thrilled with the heel fit. It wants to correct my stride compared to the Dyad 8's. The arch support is a little bit higher that the 8's. I am not sure about the longevity of the outer soft material as yet. I like the outer firmer material on the 8's but it looks like Brooks has other ideas.
customer_reviews.author: R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: My toes are happy
customer_reviews.text: A great fit for a person with many foot problems, plenty of toe box room and a perfect shoe to use with my custom orthotics. Wish I had tried these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad because he requires good arch support even though he's a normal arch. He walks daily. This is his first pair of Brooks and, after a week of wear, he really loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Used to be exclusively New Balance but kept having problems with "turf toe". Tried a set of these and no more jamming my toes into the tip of the shoe whether walking or jogging. My new go to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Two Zero

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet and orthotics!
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet and wear orthotics then this is your shoe! Very stable can be used for walking and exercise. I have been using Dyad’s for the last 8 years and have never gone back.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky_Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: BROOKS DAYD MEN'S RUNNING SHOE REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Sept. 2019. Advertised as a shoe to prevent prolongation. So far, the shoe has performed as advertised with no deterioration to date. You might buy one-size up for a perfect fit, at least in my experience. Well worth the investment. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C. Skoutas

customer_reviews.title: Ya Got Foot Probs?
customer_reviews.text: This gets a 5 because of my foot type: High arch, wide feet. My legs take a pounding. Tons of padding on the bottom. I also have orthopedic inserts so...this is my kind of shoe structurally. However if you are more of a regular foot type, you can probably find something a little flashier in Nike/ whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Grant MacMurray

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the Dyad 9
customer_reviews.text: Finally changed the Dyad back to its true form. The Dyad 9 was a complete disappointment. It was too narrow and actually hurt my feet. Had been wearing Dyad for years. The new 10 is great. Hope they keep it up. Brooks? Are you listening? Now let’s get some new colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 pairs from this line, the 10s being my favorite for my wide foot. Fits my orthotics. I use these for walking only.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing_with_Carrots

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I walk dogs 20-25 miles a week in these shoes. They hold up really well. I have a hard time finding the right shoes for my large, wide, hammer toe feet and these are the best I've found. Bought 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: redwing

customer_reviews.title: Brooks shoes are great for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Brooks Dyad shoes and they are one of the few brands I've found that actually fit those of us with wide feet. My first pair lasted about 5 years and I'm expecting to get the same out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Collins

customer_reviews.title: Just like old times
customer_reviews.text: Been running in Dyads since the Dyad 8. Loved the 8s. Wasn’t crazy about the 9s. But with these 10s, it’s just like old times.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: A foots dream.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. It really helps my supination and the shoes are extremely comfortable. I wish they came in a tan or brown, black combo. I would buy them in a heartbeat. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Considering the price I expected a much better shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Higher arch support would be better. The material the shoe is made of is uncomfortable when rub too much on same spot. Considering the price I expected more for the whole shoe design.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hein

customer_reviews.title: Keeper but careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shoe I have to buy in wide, bought normal and way too tight. Nice looking, not all those crazy gaudy colors. Durable too.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my husband and he loves them! definitely no more sketchers for him.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Great with orthotics
customer_reviews.text: Shoe works vey well with orthotics. 2nd pair I purchased. Neutral base provides very good support for the orthotic inserts.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are made extremely well. I can use my orthoses and the running shoes last for six months.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as the previous model, better looking
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable from first wear. Almost no drop from hill to toe, doing magic with my planter facialities! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Great and Comfortable running or walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, and was able to get wide size, which is so hard to find. They are very light weight and fit so smooth and makes walking a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Wil-FL

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gray/tan in a local shop but decided to purchase the black/blue online.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Brook's has done it again with Dyad 10
customer_reviews.text: Brook's has done it again and bought back the Dyad. Last year's Dyad were just awful and the Dyad 10 are awesome. Working my eight hour shifts are a breeze once again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjam

customer_reviews.title: new style
customer_reviews.text: The style has been upgraded to keep up with the current trend but still feels the same as previous. Good fit and true to size, I will continue to keep it as my default walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Brooks are the most supportive
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Brooks Dyad sneakers for over 25 years. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: iwysiwyg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and feel good. Shows how bad my other shoes were.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these since the sixth version and I won’t buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mikek

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Loves the shoes because they are easy on sore toes!
customer_reviews.author: Ann McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Every year since suffering from plantar fasciitis in 2007, at the advice of my physical therapist, I buy a new pair of Brooks Dyads and it’s the one thing that keeps it away. Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Profile

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 11 or 12. 13 does best for this.
customer_reviews.author: JBR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Our son said they were the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Nimocks

customer_reviews.title: He likes them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he likes them. His dr recommended Brook shoes for him since his knee surgery. He said these are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of a Brooks shoe I have been wearing for several years. Fits my foot very comfortably right out of the box. Wish Brooks would make them in some additional color combos
customer_reviews.author: Allan S

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel and Fit
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these shoes after I had foot surgery. I am on my second pair because I like them that much.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Some changes, but still a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Dyads since the dyad 6s. The 10s are a little more snug around the mid foot and arch and the tongue is a bit narrow, but they are still a comfortable neutral shoe. I wear orthotics and these shoes still fit the inserts very well. Love my Dyads!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cook

customer_reviews.title: Possibly not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: The insole on this shoe started to tear away after my fourth run. Very annoying when trying to work out in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: The dyads are my go tos when I have chance to get them on sale. Can’t wait to put some miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: If u need a very neutral running show these are for u. Built very well and basically flat inside. They look good also.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Color was lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s better to buy shoes from a store so you can actually see them
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having back and Knee problems. After purchasing these sneakers, he no longer has that problem. He has gotten the same shoe for the last four years and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Must Try!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe! My husband has a challenge with finding a comfortable shoe with the right width and holds up well over time. This is the perfect shoe and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Califdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brooks blew it. Tons of cushioning to the point that it is too tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insole fabric peels away
customer_reviews.text: The insole fabric peels away within 30 days of use. Very poor quality. Returned one pair only to get a second pair with the same problem. Of course, rolled up fabric under your feet is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to walk in. Support is good but not restrictive
customer_reviews.author: Dawgman

customer_reviews.title: Like the product very much
customer_reviews.text: Like the product would buy again this is the second time I bought them
customer_reviews.author: John stow

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe. I use them for walking on the treadmill. I don't even need my orthotics!
customer_reviews.author: RGL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for stability if you need it
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing Dyad years ago when I had foot issues, I strayed to get cheaper shoes and nothing adds up to the stability of the Dyad. Thanks Brooks for keeping this style for peeps with foot issues
customer_reviews.author: PWest

customer_reviews.title: fit and support
customer_reviews.text: I use this sneaker tp fit over the Arizona brace. I have worn the dyad 7, and 8. this is by far the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. This is my second purchase of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbasmith

customer_reviews.title: Have always loved Brooks Dyads
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Brooks Dyads for many generations of this shoe. They always fit well and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Only This Moment

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good wide shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been great since I got them. Comfortable and fit well for my wide feet. Overall I'd say a great price for a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cranmore

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and styling. Only running shoe I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mund

customer_reviews.title: So far these shoes are good. Not amazing but very good.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the shoes were truly wide. They were comfortable but had a little slip in the heel and the left shoe fit a little different than the right.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hamende

customer_reviews.title: Minimal information on amazon site
customer_reviews.text: These were men's sneakers and nowhere in the the description did it say men's. I was searching under Wome's Dyad 10 and these came up.
customer_reviews.author: FAITH M. WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.text: This show is awesome for me just the right amount of stability and control.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D Weyrick

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the balance and comfort that these Shoes provide for my feet. In my profession I am on my feet at least eight hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don’t taste good though
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bartender with wide flat feet, I’ve been buying the same pair of shoes for several years. They fit great and last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, very comfortable. They also accommodate my custom orthotics. They shipped to me on time, everything went smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Smeds

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for flat feet like mine. Been with the Dyad for years now.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed_KY

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was hunting for so long for a shoe that didnt cause me pain, and I finally got one.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable shoe i have owned. Trying to return directly to Brooks
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilaby

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Dyad 10 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Dyad 10 can satisfy all needs of each foot with its base that offers great support but is neutral at the same time. The new wide platform design with Dual Arch Pod gives to the foot even more stability, safety and greater flexibility of the forefoot. BioMoGo DNA- The absorbing midsole guarantees a feeling of softness that adapts to every stride.The perforated mesh upper guarantees breathability, keeping feet fresh and dry.
feature_bullets: Surface: Road. Differential: 10 mm. Built for the runner needing a little extra support in a neutral platform. Ideal for orthotic wearers and flat-footed athletes alike. Engineered Mesh in the forefoot for added breathability and a more adaptable fit. Synthetic upper with an engineered mesh forefoot for added breathability and an adaptable fit. Lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Removable, moisture-wicking sockliner supplies lig
Hit your stride every time with streamlined construction and high-energized cushioning of the Brooks® Dyad 10 running shoe!
